overview:
Jorgen Sundberg helps companies leverage social media. He is a founder and consultant at Link Humans, providing strategy and training for companies looking to get the most out of Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and Blogging.

He gives public talks and university lectures on personal branding and social networking (particularly LinkedIn), as well as delivering workshops for executives and business owners.

Jorgen has a strong commercial background and has worked in the banking, insurance, technology, recruitment and consultancy sectors. He holds a Masterâ€™s degree in Marketing from the University of Stockholm, speaks three languages and has lived and worked in the US, Germany, Sweden and the UK.

He was previously a director at Red Commerce, one of Europeâ€™s largest specialist recruitment companies where he helped achieve a turnover growth from Â£2 million to Â£55 million, growing the headcount from 22 to 104 employees, achieving the Virgin Fast Track award 3 years in a row and securing a private equity buy out worth Â£16 million.

After his time in recruitment, he set up the popular career blog The Undercover Recruiter to help job seekers anywhere in the world. Jorgen is also the founder of Personal Branding UK and the Social Media London meetup group.

Contact Jorgen at jorgen@linkhumans or 0781 681 3283 (UK).
